document.full_text: the united nations security council remained divided on tuesday over a resolution that calls for a no-flight zone over libya and authorizes the use of force to halt the bombing of civilians.
document.title: security council uncertain about intervening in libya
lines_and_colors: the united nations security council remained divided on tuesday over a resolution that calls for a no-flight zone over libya and authorizes the use of force to halt the bombing of civilians.
